HowWeWorkSection.title: This is how we work
HowWeWorkSection.subtitle: With a focus on efficiency and quality, we leverage the power of the Scrum methodology to manage our scalable teams. By following this agile framework, we ensure smooth collaboration, adaptability, and timely delivery of exceptional application developments.

Metadata.title: {appName} - {appDescription}
Metadata.description: Experts in custom software development, UX/UI design, and technology staffing to boost your business.

Metadata.ogDescription: We transform ideas into innovative digital solutions.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Technological solutions that drive the growth of your company.
Metadata.landingPageDescription: Discover how {appName} can transform your business with innovative software solutions.

testimonial1.quote: The project was their number one priority and they thought about what was best for it. Somnio always made excellent suggestions on how to improve the project from a commercial and process perspective, which made it even better and brought us closer to our goals.

costQuestion.question: How much does it cost to develop an application with GreenTI?
costQuestion.answer: The cost of developing an application varies significantly depending on complexity, features, platforms (iOS, Android, web), design, and development hours. At GreenTI, we offer a free consultation to understand your project and provide a detailed and transparent quote.

whyGreentiQuestion.question: Why should I choose GreenTI for my software project?
whyGreentiQuestion.answer: Choosing GreenTI means opting for a technology partner committed to innovation and quality. We have a team of experts, proven agile methodologies, and a customer-centric approach to ensure your project not only meets but exceeds your expectations.

toolsQuestion.question: What technologies and tools do you use in your developments?
toolsQuestion.answer: We use a modern and robust technology stack, adapted to the needs of each project. This includes languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, Python; frameworks like React, Next.js, Node.js, Django; and cutting-edge tools for DevOps, databases, and cloud computing.

brochureQuestion.question: Do you have a more detailed brochure or portfolio of your services and projects?
brochureQuestion.answer: Of course! We'd be happy to share our corporate brochure and a more extensive project portfolio with you. Please contact us via our form or email, and we'll send it to you shortly.

ServicesSection.subtitle: We are your strategic technology partner. From development to specialized consulting, we support you through every stage of your project to ensure exceptional results.
ServicesSection.projectDevelopmentDescription: Creation of software solutions applying different technologies and methodologies.
ServicesSection.uiUxDescription: We design usable and attractive apps/websites for your users.
ServicesSection.multiplatformAppsDescription: We develop multiplatform apps (mobile, tablet, web) with Flutter.
ServicesSection.onlineCoursesDescription: Specialize in high-demand areas with our 100% live courses.

SectorsSection.financialServicesDescription: We accelerate the digital transformation of finance with technologies that improve the user experience. We create secure and efficient digital ecosystems for institutions and clients.
SectorsSection.industryCommerceDescription: We digitize industry and commerce with technologies that connect processes, people, and data. We create digital ecosystems that transform the way business is done.
SectorsSection.publicSectorDescription: We transform the public sector with solutions that promote transparency and efficiency. We create platforms that facilitate services and foster citizen participation.

AboutUsSection.description: At GreenTI, we are more than just a software development company; we are your strategic partner in digital transformation. With a team passionate about innovation and excellence, we are dedicated to creating custom technology solutions that drive the growth and efficiency of your business. From intuitive mobile applications to robust enterprise systems, our focus is on understanding your unique needs to deliver results that exceed your expectations.

AboutUsSectionFigma.mainDescription: At GreenTI, we merge a passion for technology with an unwavering commitment to our clients. We are a team of innovators, thinkers, and creators dedicated to building software solutions that not only solve problems but also inspire and transform. We believe in the power of collaboration and transparency to forge the digital future, one project at a time.
AboutUsSectionFigma.image1Alt: Main image for the About Us section showing office collaboration.
AboutUsSectionFigma.image2Alt: Secondary image for the About Us section with focused developers.
AboutUsSectionFigma.image3Alt: Tertiary image for the About Us section highlighting focused individual work.

AboutPage.pageDescription: Learn more about the team and values driving {appName}.

hero.paragraph: With GREENTI, you get more than just people executing; you get experts who anticipate, challenge ideas and build with you. We work as one team with one goal: overcoming your data challenges so you can scale operations and unlock your business potential.

brand.title: Greenti
brand.paragraph: With GREENTI, you get more than just people executing; you get experts who anticipate, challenge ideas and build alongside you. We act as one team to overcome your technological challenges and help you scale sustainably.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Drive sustainable growth for our clients by crafting custom software solutions that create measurable impact.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Be the preferred strategic technology partner in LATAM for organizations scaling through continuous innovation.

passion.title: Passion
